definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: But don't do anything to these men, for they have come under the protection of my roof.
sentences.chinese: 只是這兩個人既然到我舍下，不要向他們做什麼。

sentences.english: The centurion replied, "Lord, I do not deserve to have you come under my roof.
sentences.chinese: 百夫長回答說，主阿，你到我舍下，我不敢當。

sentences.english: All beans were then eaten by chicken and ducks before long.
sentences.chinese: 那一粒豆沒找到，先前舍下的，都被雞鴨喫光了。

sentences.english: Drop in for tea whenever you're passing.
Therefore I did not presume to come to you.
sentences.chinese: 因你到我舍下，我不敢當。

definition: lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
I beg to disturb you/I trespass on your hospitality/Thank you for your hospitality!
sir (respectful form of address for an old man)
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
uncle (affectionate name for a friend older than one's father)/old friend
how could one dare?/I don't deserve such praise
